021import net.tnemc.core.account.Account;
022
023import java.util.HashMap;
024import java.util.Map;
025import java.util.UUID;
026
027/**
028 * Represents a player that has access to an account.
029 *
030 * @author creatorfromhell
031 * @see Account
032 * @since 0.1.1.17
033 */
034public class Member {
035
036  private final Map<String, Boolean> permissions = new HashMap<>();
037
038  /**
039   * The {@link UUID identifier} associated with the player that is represented by this member
040   * object.
041   */
042  private final UUID id;
043
044  /**
045   * Construct a new member using an {@link UUID identifier}.
046   *
047   * @param id The {@link UUID identifier} of this member.
048   */
049  public Member(final UUID id) {
050
051    this.id = id;
052  }
053
054  public UUID getId() {
055
056    return id;
057  }
058
059  /**
060   * Sets the permission specified to the specified value for this member.
061   *
062   * @param permission The permission to set.
063   * @param value      The value to set for the permission.
064   */
065  public void addPermission(final Permission permission, final boolean value) {
066
067    permissions.put(permission.identifier(), value);
068  }
069
070  /**
071   * Sets the permission specified to the specified value for this member.
072   *
073   * @param permission The permission to set.
074   * @param value      The value to set for the permission.
075   */
076  public void addPermission(final String permission, final boolean value) {
077
078    permissions.put(permission, value);
079  }
080
081  /**
082   * Removes the permission specified from this member.
083   *
084   * @param permission The permission to set.
085   */
086  public void removePermission(final Permission permission) {
087
088    permissions.remove(permission.identifier());
089  }
090
091  /**
092   * Removes the permission specified from this member.
093   *
094   * @param permission The permission to set.
095   */
096  public void removePermission(final String permission) {
097
098    permissions.remove(permission);
099  }
100
101  /**
102   * Checks if this member has the specified permission.
103   *
104   * @param permission The permission to we are checking for.
105   *
106   * @return True if this member has the specified permission, otherwise false.
107   */
108  public boolean hasPermission(final Permission permission) {
109
110    return permissions.getOrDefault(permission.identifier(), permission.defaultValue());
111  }
112
113  /**
114   * Checks if this member has the specified permission.
115   *
116   * @param permission   The permission to we are checking for.
117   * @param defaultValue The default value to return if this account doesn't contain the
118   *                     permission.
119   *
120   * @return True if this member has the specified permission, otherwise false.
121   */
122  public boolean hasPermission(final String permission, final boolean defaultValue) {
123
124    return permissions.getOrDefault(permission, defaultValue);
125  }
126
127  public Map<String, Boolean> getPermissions() {
128
129    return permissions;
130  }
131}
